name: The Drill RPG (itch)
description:
The Drill RPG spoof crime-comedy adventure is now available for Android! 

Filled with crazy characters, unique dialogs and UK drill and grime inspired music, this turn-based RPG game will keep you guessing what will happen next!

Explore your block with the gang and find out why your main opp (enemy) has come to your hideout! 

If you're looking for funny RPG games then look no further! The Drill RPG is an entertaining journey from start to finish and certainly like no other mobile RPG game on the Google Play Store! 

This classic style role-playing game was initially built so people could explore a pixelated world based around crime, grime and UK drill rap......but also have a laugh at the same time!

Whether you like London drill music or not, this epic RPG game will certainly keep you amused and curious!

So can you trust your main opp? Or is it a set-up? Well gather up the gang and go ride out!

- Worldmap

- Battle system

- Side missions

- Various locations

- Hidden weapons

The once in a lifetime mobile game with rude RPG humour will be an experience no one will ever forget!

________________________________

If you follow UK drill reddit then be sure to join The Drill RPG subreddit to give your feedback and ideas on what else could be added into the game!

***Buy the game, get the FULL game. NO ADS, NO MICROTRANSACTIONS***  

(Can also use as an offline RPG game once purchased)

NEXT UPDATE: 

1. The mobile controls will be changed from a 360° stick to 4 direction buttons

2. Scaling on different devices

TIP: 

1. Go into options and turn on ‘Always Dash’, then your character will move faster if you press the screen without using the 360° stick.

2. To return in battle menu - press two fingers on screen at the same time
